subject: Soccer
Bribery and Kickbacks
World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The chief executive of Ireland’s soccer association said it was paid after a controversial hand ball by France’s Thierry Henry prevented Ireland from qualifying for the 2010 World Cup.
snippet: The chief executive of Ireland’s soccer association said it was paid after a controversial hand ball by France’s Thierry Henry prevented Ireland from qualifying for the 2010 World Cup.
